name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Respoke
description: This is a repository of respoke APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Respoke
apis.description: Respoke makes it incredibly easy to add real-time communications capabilities to the things you build. Integrate text chat, audio calling, video collaboration, screen sharing, and peer-to-peer data with just a few lines of JavaScript.
